translations: v.解放，使不受（法律、政治或社会的）束缚

phrs.translation: 解放, 释放, 不受束缚
从过去解放自己, 挣脱你的过去, 从解放自己的过去

sentences.sentence: This new machine will emancipate us from the hard work.
sentences.translation: 这部新机器将把我们从繁重劳动中解放出来。

sentences.sentence: To emancipate all mankind, we will balk at no sacrifice. even that of our lives.
sentences.translation: 为了全人类的解放，即使牺牲生命也在所不惜。

sentences.sentence: This new machine will emancipate us from all the hard work.
sentences.translation: 这台新机器将使我们从繁重的劳作中解脱出来。
